summary: This bill, the Technology Grants to Strengthen Domestic Mining Education Act of 2025, aims to bolster domestic mining education via technology grants. The Secretary of Energy, in consultation with the Secretary of Interior, will award grants to mining schools to recruit and educate future mining professionals.  The bill defines key terms, establishes a Mining Professional Development Advisory Board, and outlines grant usage, including support for mineral extraction efficiency, critical mineral exploration, and environmental remediation. The Mining and Mineral Resources Research Institute Act of 1984 is repealed. The bill specifies that no additional funds are authorized.
